description: This is a sample quiz template showing the required JSON format for uploading structured MCQ quiz data to QuestAI. This template contains only multiple-choice questions.
title: Sample Quiz Template

questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital and largest city of France.

questions.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars is called the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.
